title: Join TÐB Today!
body:
The Dunk Brotherhood (TÐB) is recruiting friendly dunkers all around the country! Only two rules are needed to be sworn to follow upon joining.

1: You must swear to dunk your enemies until you can dunk no more!

2: Have a good time doing it!

As you can probably guess, dunking champions are better suited to this team, but non dunking champions are ok too, as long as there is at least one dunker in the team. Dunkers include:

{{champion:266}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:115}} 

Leave a comment below if you are interested! (Note: This applies to players looking for a fun time, we are not a very serious team.)

replies.body: Are you guys a ranked team or can non ranked can join (oceanic open ladder)
We are a ranked team but that doesn't necessarily mean that you can't be a member. We mostly would just muck around in normals so just as long as I had you added, you can be a part of it :)
Oh, and btw, all divisions are accepted for the team.

woah? u accept bronzies and silvers?... 
SHAME ON YOU
Well I'm a bronzie, so it would be wrong if I didn't allow members from my own league to join. Besides, it doesn't really matter, as this team is **not** a serious one, but rather a casual one.
Jax, Garen, Wukong should be removed tbh
I only really put them as candidates due to limited options. They don't have the best dunks out there, but it's something. More options is always a good thing, right?
